_missing-action-commands: /* MISSING: bite, bloodsuck, holdhands, stare, smile, blush, sleepy, dance, cry, eat, highfive */

help.title: Tomoko's Help
help.description: O-Oh, you need some h-help, here are s-some of my f-features:

fields.name: :warning: Testing version
fields.value:
This i-is still a v-very, very e-early version of m-me, features might n-not work or miss c-completely.
I-If that i-is the case, j-just be p-patient.

fields.name: :handshake: Support
fields.value:
If y-you need further S-Support, please j-join [my Discord Server](https://discord.gg/EK9F28B).
For m-more information about a c-command, u-use `help <command>`. B-Before commands, a-always set a `*`.

help.description:
I-If `command` argument s-specified:
Get help f-for a command.
If h-no `command` a-argument specified:
L-List all aviable c-commands.

reboot.description:
Disconnects a-all shards and shuts m-me down,
then u-updates everything and then s-starts me again.
Bot o-owner only.

invite.description: Sends y-you an invite w-which you can use t-to invite me to your server.

addfriend.description:
S-Sends a friend r-request.
B-Bot owner only, only w-works on u-user accounts (Userbots a-are against t-the Discord ToS).

support.description: S-Sends an invite t-to my official D-Discord server.

vote.description: Sends a l-link where you c-can vote for m-me :smiley:

checkvote.description: Checks i-if you v-voted for me a-and gives you a r-role on my official D-Discord Server if y-you did.

testperm.description:
A l-little command used f-for some testing.
Y-You can use i-it to check whether I a-am onine or n-not.

play.description:
A-Add music t-to the queue.
`play yturl <URL>`: A-Adds the URL `URL` t-to the queue. T-This m-must be a direct Y-YouTube l-link (e.g. youtube.com o-or youtu.be)
`play radio <Station>`: P-Plays the s-specified radio s-station. For a l-list of stations, s-see `*liststations`

liststations.description: L-Lists all t-the available r-radio stations.

stop.description: I-I'll stop the c-currently p-playing music and leave t-the channel.

join.description: I-I'll j-join your v-voice channel a-and initialize m-my music p-player.

repeat.description:
Sets the r-repeat mode.
T-The argument `mode` c-can be:
`song`: Repeats t-the current s-song.
`queue`: R-Repeats the current q-queue
`off`: T-Turns repeating o-off.

shuffle.description: S-Switches b-between shuffle a-and noshuffle mode.

volume.description:
Sets t-the volume.
`vol` s-should be a n-number, e.g. `0.5`, `1.0`, `1.2`...

pat.description: S-Sends a pat image t-to the specified u-user.

hug.description: S-Sends a hug image t-to the specified u-user.

kiss.description: S-Sends a kiss image t-to the specified u-user.

slap.description: S-Sends a slap image t-to the specified u-user.

tickle.description: S-Sends a tickle image t-to the specified u-user.

cuddle.description: S-Sends a cuddle image t-to the specified u-user.

poke.description: S-Sends a poke image t-to the specified u-user.

feed.description: S-Sends a feed image t-to the specified u-user.

clap.description: A-Adds a :clap: between e-every word o-of `text`.

spoiler.description: Creates an i-individual spoiler f-for every letter o-of `text`.

avatar.description:
R-Returns avatar f-for the given user/u-userID.
If n-no user/userID is given, y-your own avatar will b-be returned.

giveaway.description:
S-Starts a g-g-iveaway that l-lasts `durationMinutes` minutes.
T-The winner w-will receive the m-mentioned role.
I-If `mentionEveryone` i-is `true`, every member will b-be notified of t-the giveaway
